history.proof: intros. induction H. - srun best use: app_nil_l, op_equivalent_refl. - constructor. apply IHop_equivalent. - constructor. + sfirstorder depth: 3. + sfirstorder depth: 3. - sauto lq: on.

exceptions.tactic: intros K K_eq_dec l xs ys H.
intros K' K_eq_dec l xs ys H.
intros K' K_eq_dec' l xs ys H.

exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.
Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros K K_eq_dec l xs ys H. induction H. - intros. constructor. - intros. constructor. apply IHop_equivalent. - intros. constructor. apply (good_op_move). + auto. + apply IHop_equivalent. - intros. apply op_equiv_trans with (l2 := []). + auto. + apply IHop_equivalent2.
